topComments.author: Madeleine England
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Reservamos uma cabana King, que acabou sendo uma √≥tima decis√£o. No dia em que fomos, fazia 100 graus l√° fora e era feriado de segunda-feira. O parque estava lotado! Tantas linhas.  Essa cabana vem com o que eu chamaria de concierge. Alexa (n√£o a vers√£o AI) veio nos verificar meia d√∫zia de vezes ao longo do dia e reabasteceu nossas garrafas de √°gua (n√≥s as trouxemos conosco). Al√©m disso, conseguimos pedir comida pelo aplicativo e Alexa trouxe para n√≥s! Assim, conseguimos evitar as filas de alimenta√ß√£o. A cabana tinha 6 espregui√ßadeiras e duas mesas de jantar com 8 cadeiras no total. O nosso era muito particular e com vista para o rio lento.  O parque estava t√£o limpo. Como n√≠vel Disney limpo. E os salva-vidas pareciam diligentes. Desde que negligenciamos o rio lento e um salva-vidas, vi com que frequ√™ncia eles trocavam (para evitar fadiga - algo que voc√™ N√ÉO quer em um salva-vidas que est√° constantemente procurando algu√©m se afogando) e como eles estavam focados. O servi√ßo que recebemos foi excepcional; impressionante, considerando que eu s√≥ fazia interface com adolescentes e adultos jovens.  A √∫nica cr√≠tica √© a comida √© uma porcaria. A comida n√£o s√≥ √© p√©ssima em qualidade e sabor, mas tamb√©m em termos de acesso. O √∫nico restaurante est√° aberto apenas das 11:30h √†s 15:30h. E a sorveteria abre √†s 14h. H√° outros lugares pequenos que vendem nozes e pipoca tamb√©m, mas um restaurante. Por causa da falta de funcion√°rios (assumindo que isso √© porque todos est√£o com poucos funcion√°rios), havia apenas uma pessoa trabalhando em um registro em cada local. E as filas eram t√£o longas. Tipo mais de uma hora para tomar sorvete. Esteja preparado para isso.  Amei esse lugar e n√£o vejo a hora de voltar!  (Original) We reserved a King cabana, which ended up being a great decision. The day we went it was 100 degrees outside and it was a Monday holiday. The park was crowded! So many lines.  That cabana comes with a what I would call a concierge. Alexa (not the AI version) came to check on us a half dozen times throughout the day and refilled our water bottles (we brought them with us). Also, we were able to order food off the app and Alexa brought it to us! So we were able to avoid the food lines. The cabana had 6 lounge chairs and two dining tables with 8 chairs total. Ours was very private and overlooked the lazy river.  The park was so clean. Like Disney level clean. And the life guards seemed diligent. Since we overlooked the lazy river and a lifeguard, I saw how often they switched out (to prevent fatigue- something you DO NOT want in a lifeguard who is constantly looking for someone drowning) and how focused they were. The service we received was exceptional; impressive considering I only interfaced with teenagers and young adults.  The only criticism is the food sucks. The food not only sucks in quality and taste, but it sucks in terms of access. The one restaurant is only open from 11:30-3. And the ice cream place opens at 2pm. There are other small places that sell nuts and popcorn too, but one restaurant. Because of the lack of staff (assuming this is because everyone is short on staff) the was only one person working a register at each place. And the lines were so so long. Like over an hour to get ice cream. Be prepared for this.  I loved this place and can‚Äôt wait to go back!

topComments.author: vishnu vardhan reddy
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Raging Rivers √© um lugar perfeito para passar um dia quente. Dos 2 tobo√°guas principais a uma piscina ENORME (com ondas ocasionais) √† zona infantil para rios lentos - este lugar tem muito para um dia divertido na √°gua. H√° algo para crian√ßas e adultos fazerem. √ìtimo parque aqu√°tico. H√° muitos dias com ofertas de desconto ou ofertas especiais. H√° tamb√©m arm√°rios e tubos dispon√≠veis para aluguel. Certifique-se de verificar o site Raging Rivers para promo√ß√µes, juntamente com a lista de itens n√£o permitidos no parque. Como com qualquer coisa, eu encorajo voc√™ a planejar e fazer uma viagem para Grafton e para o Parque Aqu√°tico Raging Rivers. Planejamos fazer pelo menos mais uma ou duas viagens para l√° neste ver√£o.  (Original) Raging Rivers is a perfect place to spend a hot day. From the 2 main water slides to a HUGE pool (with the occasional wave) to kids zone to lazy rivers- this place has a lot for a fun day in the water. There's something for both kids and adults to do. Great water park. There are a lot of days with discount offers or special deals. There are also lockers and tubes available for rent. I would make sure you check the Raging Rivers website for deals along with the list of items not allowed into the park. As with anything, I would encourage you to pre-plan and make a trip to Grafton and to the Raging Rivers Waterpark. We plan on making at least one or two more trips there this summer.

topComments.author: arif ali meer
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Muito tempo para entrar, a gest√£o n√£o √© t√£o boa. Levar√° algumas horas para entrar na entrada durante o hor√°rio de pico. Possui apenas um balc√£o para escanear e deixar entrar pessoas que tenham ingressos reservados e impressos. Tenha mais scanners de ingressos na entrada para diminuir o tempo de entrada. O parque √© bom, escorregas bons para crian√ßas por um dia.  (Original) Too long to get in, management not so good. It will take a few hours to get in to entrance during peak time. Has only one counter to scan and let people in who have tickets reserved and printed. Have more ticket scanners at entrance to decrease entry time. Park is good, nice slides good for kids for one day.

topComments.author: Ricardo Chavez
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O lugar √© enorme, ent√£o eu e meu filho nos divertimos muito, mas 100 d√≥lares para dois foi um pouco √≠ngreme. CERTIFIQUE-SE DE QUE SUA BOLSA EST√Å VINDO ATRAV√âS OU VOC√ä VAI VOLTAR AO CARRO YPUR PARA DEIXAR O QUE VOC√ä TEM  (Original) The place is huge so me and my son had a blast but 100 bucks for two was a bit steep. Other than the price the park is awesome alot of slides and the pool that makes waves. Lines weren't too bad when we were there but they do a decent job of keeping them moving. All in all thumbs up. MAKE SURE YOUR BAG IS SEE THROUGH OR YOU WILL WALK BACK TO YPUR CAR TO DROP OFF THE ONE YOU HAVE

topComments.author: Martha Muniz
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Grande parque de √°gua limpa. Parece que eles realmente cuidam dos jardins e garantem que os vesti√°rios e os banheiros estejam limpos. Muitos salva-vidas em cada piscina. Se voc√™ planeja vir traga seus itens em uma sacola pl√°stica transparente, j√° que outras sacolas n√£o s√£o permitidas (al√©m da sua bolsa). Eles vendem sacolas pl√°sticas transparentes no port√£o do estacionamento por US $ 10, caso voc√™ precise de uma. Os arm√°rios custam $ 12 e $ 15. Se voc√™ chegar l√° por volta das 4, voc√™ realmente n√£o precisa de uma, apenas encontre uma cadeira vazia e voc√™ ficar√° bem. Aluguei os $ 15 e acabei n√£o usando porque n√£o consegui encontrar o local e n√£o queria perder tempo procurando. Muitas op√ß√µes de comida. Bebidas e alimentos de fora n√£o s√£o permitidos.  (Original) Great, clean water park. It seems like they really take care of the grounds and making sure locker rooms and bathrooms are clean. Plenty of life guards in every pool. If you plan on coming bring your items in a clear plastic bag since any other bags are not allowed (aside from your purse). They do sell clear plastic bags at the parking gate for $10 in case you need one. Lockers are $12 and $15. If you get there around 4, you really don‚Äôt need one, just find an empty chair and you will be fine. I rented the $15 and ended up not using it since I could not find the location and I did not want to wast time looking for it. Lots of food options. Outside drinks and food is not allowed.

topComments.author: Amber Ashley
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Caro mas vale a pena! Tem uma Cabana e foi agradavelmente recebido com refrescos. A equipe foi amig√°vel e extremamente √∫til. A pizza de Joey me deixou tentando pedir quando cheguei em casa. O Dole Twist foi delicioso e os passeios emocionantes!  A chegada antecipada √© altamente recomendada. Obrigado por um √≥timo dia! Definitivamente estar√° de volta.  (Original) Pricey but well worth it! Got a Cabana and was pleasantly greeted with refreshments. Staff was friendly and extremely helpful. Joey‚Äôs pizza left me trying order once I got home. The Dole Twist was delicious and the rides were exciting!  Early arrival highly recommended. Thanks for a great day! Definitely will be back.

topComments.author: Drivin' Fast
topComments.comment: Park is clean but lines are long. I totally understand being short staffed as many businesses are- including my own. But‚Ä¶the craptastic attitude of the staff is beyond. I mean, i walked up to get a drink and said hello to young girl working. She just looked at me- never said a word- scowl on her face- and i said thanks have a great day to you! Nothing. I figured just young and no experience in service. But no, it happened again when my son went to get ice cream. Jeez. It‚Äôs not hard for people to be civil. But rude is just unnecessary- especially when no one was rude to them at all first. All in all, the park is clean. It‚Äôs a bit overpriced for the variety of rides. And then parking fees, locker fees. Food places are closed- and the food isn‚Äôt great anyway.  It‚Äôs crowded, lines are long. I think my family is done traveling 40 min to this water park.

topComments.author: Jose Manuel Camacho

A aten√ß√£o do pessoal, alguns apenas fazem o seu trabalho e n√£o s√£o nada amig√°veis.  (Original) Es un lugar donde te puedes divertir con toda la familia, excelentes atracciones. El d√≠a que lo visit√© no hab√≠a mucha gente, por lo cual las filas de espera no eran muy largas. La renta de caba√±as no lo veo necesario, ya que no tienen un lugar para dejar tus cosas con mayor seguridad. La atenci√≥n del personal, algunos solo cumplen su trabajo y no son nada amables.

topComments.author: Cynthia Espino
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Lugar divertido para passar o ver√£o em fam√≠lia. Ame o rio lento. Toneladas de slides para todas as idades. A piscina de ondas √© √≥tima (mas √© a √∫nica "piscina"). pre√ßos de alimentos em fotos  (Original) Fun place to chill with the family for the summer. Love the lazy river. Tons of slides for all ages to enjoy. The wave pool is great (but it's the only "pool"). food prices in pics

topComments.author: RJ M
topComments.comment: The Rolls-Royce of Illinois water parks. Very clean and very well staffed. There‚Äôs a police cop that‚Äôs stationed right on the property. Security everywhere. The food was great. The locker system is great the only complaint was some of the scanners weren‚Äôt working. All around had a great day today

topComments.author: Aric Donnelly
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Tr√™s estrelas √© demais. Comprou bilhetes e estacionamento online. Estacionamento foi suave, muito pequeno esperar l√°. A fila para entrar levou meia hora, mas as pessoas sem ingressos entraram quase que imediatamente. Completamente insuficiente. Muitos slides n√£o estavam funcionando, ent√£o os que estavam tinham uma espera de 45 a 60 minutos. Demorou duas horas desde o momento em que estacionei at√© o momento em que finalmente ca√≠ em um tobo√°gua. Concess√µes levou 30 minutos para comida med√≠ocre. Pre√ßo e qualidade estavam a par com o que eu esperava para um lugar como este, mas n√£o a espera. H√° muito pouca sombra por fora tamb√©m.  Parque agrad√°vel, escorregas divertidos, √© limpo e parece estar bem conservado, mas as longas esperas constantes s√£o brutais. No geral, n√£o vale a pena.  (Original) Three stars is too much. Bought tickets and parking online. Parking went smoothe, very small wait there. The line to get it in took half an hour, but people without tickets got in almost immediately. Completely understaffed. Many slides not running, so the ones that were had a 45-60 minute wait. It took two hours from the time I parked to the time I finally splashed down a water slide. Concessions took 30 minutes for mediocre food. Price and quality were on par with what I expected for a place like this, but not the wait. There's very little shade through out as well.  Nice park, fun slides, it's clean and seems to be well maintained, but the constant long waits are brutal. Overall, not worth it.

topComments.author: Maria Martinez
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Definitivamente adoro! Conseguimos os passes sazonais e vale a pena at√© agora fomos 4 vezes sempre nos divertindo.  (Original) Definitely love it ! We got the seasonal passes and it‚Äôs worth it so far we went 4 times always having fun.

topComments.author: Clementina Garcia
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu amo este parque aqu√°tico! √â sempre t√£o limpo e bem conservado! Existem muitos slides para todas as idades! Uma piscina de ondas e algumas √°reas separadas para seus beb√™s e crian√ßas maiores! Sem comida ou bebida permitida. Voc√™ pode sair do parque e voltar se quiser levar comida e comer no estacionamento. Existem algumas mesas de piquenique em todo o estacionamento. Muito conveniente. Mas tamb√©m h√° uma variedade de concess√µes para escolher para comer .. quando voc√™ for, deve ter todos os seus itens em uma sacola transparente para entrar. Casas de banho muito limpas, muitos guardas de vida e funcion√°rios simp√°ticos. O estacionamento √© gratuito, ou pague para ficar um pouco mais perto da entrada. Os arm√°rios est√£o dispon√≠veis por cerca de 10/15 d√≥lares. Minha fam√≠lia passou o dia inteiro aqui sempre que viemos! Definitivamente, recomendo este lindo parque aqu√°tico!  (Original) I love this water park! It's always so clean and well maintained! There are a lot of slides for all ages! A wave pool, and a few separate areas for your toddlers and bigger kids! No food or drinks allowed. You can exit the park and return if you wish to take food and eat in the parking lot. There are some picnic tables thruout the parking lot. Very convenient. But there is also a variety of concessions to choose from to eat.. when you go you must have all your items in a clear bag to enter. Very clean bathrooms, a lot of life guards and nice staff. Parking is free, or pay to be a little closer to the entrance. Lockers are available for about 10/15 dollars. My family has spent the entire day here everytime we come! I definitely recommend this beautiful Waterpark!

topComments.author: Beth Niedoborski
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este √© um parque aqu√°tico muito bom em Yorkville, IL. √â mantido muito limpo e bem conservado. Eles permitem apenas sacos transparentes, 2 garrafas de √°gua lacradas e uma garrafa de √°gua reutiliz√°vel vazia. O estacionamento custa $ 10. Minha √∫nica reclama√ß√£o √© que √© caro, US $ 40 por mais de 42 "de altura.  (Original) This is a really nice waterpark in Yorkville, IL.  It is kept really clean and is well maintained.   They only allow clear bags, 2 sealed bottles of water, and one empty reusable water bottle.   Parking is $10.  My only complaint is it is pricey, $40 for over 42" tall.

topComments.author: Debbie Honn
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √â um bom lugar para a fam√≠lia. Estava limpo. Grande √°rea para as crian√ßas mais novas. Slides e rio lento para crian√ßas mais velhas. Confira o site deles para regras sobre o que voc√™ pode trazer. O Groupon tinha ingressos. Pague para estacionar, etc. Apenas uma piscina "normal" com a√ß√£o das ondas.  (Original) It's good place for the family. It was clean. Big area for the younger kids. Slides and lazy river for older kids. Check out their website for rules on what you can bring in. Groupon had tickets. Pay to park, etc. Only one "regular" swimming pool with wave action.

topComments.author: Keenan Robinson
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) *CAL√áA SEUS SAPATOS* Ch√£o quente üòÖ Recomende um chap√©u, √≥culos de sol e uma dessas capas √† prova d'√°gua para o seu telefone, se voc√™ quiser traz√™-lo. Fui em uma tarde de quinta-feira por volta das 12h30, sa√≠ por volta das 4h30 e consegui descer todos os escorregadores menos um. As filas n√£o eram ruins. Os tobo√°guas foram INCR√çVEIS para adultos üòé Comprou o ingresso ANY DAY antecipadamente on-line - pre√ßo registrado de US $ 45 (eles os vendem √†s vezes, conseguiram o segundo ingresso com um desconto de US $ 7). Tamb√©m comprei estacionamento padr√£o com anteced√™ncia por US$ 10. Voc√™ tamb√©m pode pagar por ambos quando chegar ao parque, se n√£o quiser obt√™-los com anteced√™ncia. O Small Locker custava US$ 12 por dia; grande o suficiente para 2 pessoas. Eles imprimem um suporte para voc√™ digitalizar para abrir os arm√°rios.  (Original) *WEAR YOUR SHOES* Hot ground üòÖ Recommend a hat, sunglasses & one of those water proof cases for your phone if you want to bring it. Went on a Thursday afternoon around 12:30, left around 4:30 and was able to go down all slides besides one. Lines weren‚Äôt bad. Water Slides were AWESOME for adults üòé Bought ANY DAY ticket ahead of time online- reg price $45 (they have them on sale sometimes, got the 2nd ticket with a $7 discount). Also bought standard parking ahead of time for $10. You can pay for both when you arrive at park as well if you don‚Äôt want to get them ahead of time. Small Locker was $12 for the day; big enough for 2 people. They print a bracket for you to scan to open the lockers.

topComments.author: Lauren Dauphin
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√≥s vamos √†s ondas furiosas como uma tradi√ß√£o para o anivers√°rio da minha tia todos os anos. Sempre alugamos uma cabana para facilitar com as crian√ßas e um lugar para sair do sol para descansar. A comida √© √≥tima, o atendimento √© excelente e o parque √© cheio de coisas divertidas para todas as idades. Em suma, adoramos ondas furiosas e √© uma das nossas melhores tradi√ß√µes de ver√£o!  (Original) We go to raging waves as a tradition for my aunt's birthday every year.  We always rent a cabana for ease with the kids and a place to get out of the sun to rest.  The food is great, the service is excellent, and the park is full of fun things for all ages.  All in all, we love raging waves and it is one of our best summer traditions!

topComments.author: Stacey Hall
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O parque √© limpo e bem cuidado. As l√¢minas do corpo est√£o fechadas. Ingresso pr√©-comprado conforme instru√ß√µes no site, mas se sentiu punido por faz√™-lo. Chegou √†s 10:10 da manh√£ e ficou na fila para entrar por mais de 1 hora. Apenas um guarda de seguran√ßa verificando as malas. Nenhum pessoal postado perto de arm√°rios para ajudar. Quando fui ao atendimento ao cliente para obter assist√™ncia, ele me fez esperar enquanto servia 4 outros clientes. Parque n√£o tem tubos suficientes para o rio lento ou os passeios. Preste aten√ß√£o aos sinais para os limites de peso.  (Original) The park is clean and well maintained.  Body slides are closed.  Pre-purchased ticket as instructed on the website, but felt punished for doing so.  Arrived at 1010 am and stood in line to enter for over 1 hour.  Just one security guard checking bags.  No personnel posted near lockers to assist.  When I went to customer service for assistance, he made me wait while served 4 other customers.  Park does not have enough tubes for the lazy river or the rides.  Pay attention to the signs for the weight limits.

topComments.author: Ken Frisby
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Parque aqu√°tico fant√°stico. Bem conservado e limpo. Muitos funcion√°rios simp√°ticos e prestativos. Seguran√ßa primeiro. Boa sele√ß√£o de op√ß√µes de comida. De üå≠ cachorros quentes e hamb√∫rgueres üçî a Jets üçï Pizza. Gostamos que voc√™ possa trazer duas garrafas de √°gua lacradas por pessoa. Tem permiss√£o para entrar novamente se quiser comer em seu carro. √ìtima ideia usar pulseiras com c√≥digo de barras para que seu grupo tenha acesso ao aluguel do seu arm√°rio durante o dia todo. PARA SUA INFORMA√á√ÉO. Todos os itens de transporte devem estar em sacos transparentes. Mesmo se voc√™ usar sacos Ziploc.  (Original) Fantastic water park. Well maintained & clean. Plenty of friendly helpful employees. Safety First. Nice selection of food options. From üå≠hot dogs and hamburger üçî to Jets üçï Pizza. We liked that you can bring in two sealed bottles of water per person. Allowed to re-enter if you want to eat at your car.  Great idea using bar code wrist bands for your group to gain access to your locker rental thru out the day. FYI. All carry in items have to be in Clear Bags. Even if you use Ziploc bags.

topComments.author: Jordynn Schumacher
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este √© um √≥timo parque aqu√°tico, mas muito ocupado e eles o enganam sem dinheiro. Em nenhum lugar no site diz apenas sacos transparentes. Em nenhum lugar no site diz que voc√™ deve pagar pelo estacionamento. Ao chegar l√°, voc√™ passa metade do dia esperando na fila s√≥ para entrar no parque. No total, voc√™ gasta 50 d√≥lares s√≥ para conseguir andar tr√™s tobo√°guas. √â rid√≠culo. A equipe √© hostil e isso √© um total desperd√≠cio de tempo e dinheiro. Esteja preparado. Voc√™ precisa de um ingresso ANTES de vir, caso contr√°rio, voc√™ perder√° seu dia. Foda-se este lugar.  (Original) This is a great water park but way too busy and they scam you out of money. Nowhere on the website does it say clear bags only. Nowhere on the website does it say you must pay for parking. When you get there, you spend half your day waiting in line just to enter the park. In total, you spend 50 bucks just to get to ride three slides. It's ridiculous. Staff is unfriendly and this is a total waste of time and money. Be prepared. You need a ticket BEFORE coming otherwise you'll waste your day. Screw this place.
